title: Homemade American-style Pies and Treats in Z√ºrich ‚Äì Pickup in Wallisellen
text:
Flaky is a cozy home-based microbakery in the Z√ºrich area making American-style pies and treats‚Äîfrom buttery, flaky crusts to chewy and sweet rice krispie treats. Everything is handmade with high-quality Swiss ingredients. Order online for pickup in Wallisellen. Seasonal favorites include pumpkin, pecan, apple & key lime.





Products
American sweets are pure happiness ‚Äî simple and full of flavor. The tang of buttermilk and cream cheese, the sweetness of maple syrup, and all that buttery goodness‚Ä¶ they take me right back to my childhood. They‚Äôre not about perfection ‚Äî they‚Äôre about warmth, joy, and the feeling of home.
And pies? The flakiness of a pie crust combined with a sweet and creamy filling or a fragrant fruit is just joy.
Every pie and treat is baked fresh to order ‚Äî I only bake after a reservation, so each creation gets the care and time it deserves. Whether you‚Äôre craving something familiar or want to try a new twist on a classic, I‚Äôll bake it with love ‚Äî just for you.


Flaky Pies






  



Cinnamon Apple Crumble Pie



Cozy spiced apples tucked under a buttery crumble.





  



Chocolat-y Pecan Pie



The richness of dark chocolate with toasty pecans and a hint of salt.









Seasonal Pies



  



Pumpkin Pie



As we‚Äôre approaching the end of pumpkin season, availability is limited. Get in touch!





  



Biscoff Rum Lime Pie



Coming soon.







Treats & More



  



Sesame Rice Krispies Treats



Chewy, toasty-sweet bars with a nutty sesame twist.





  



Bell Pepper and Feta Cornbread



Savory-sweet cornbread topped with creamy peppers and tangy feta.





  



American Biscuits



Classic, Cheddar & Chive, or Blueberry ‚Äî so flaky and tender!





  



Custom Order



Special flavors, mini treats, occasion pies ‚Äî I‚Äôll bake your idea with love!








Prices and Order



About
Hi, I‚Äôm Marianna üëã
I‚Äôm a researcher by profession ‚Äî and a pastry chef by heart.
Originally from Italy, I trained and became certified in professional pastry before moving to Switzerland in 2016. Growing up, I spent much of my childhood travelling through the USA, where I fell in love with flaky American pies and treats.
Now, as a new mom, I‚Äôve opened a small microbakery from my home ‚Äî a space where I can share my love for pastry while spending precious time with my baby.

So funktioniert‚Äôs
Jeder Pie wird mit Liebe von Hand gemacht ‚Äì mit Sorgfalt, Zeit und hochwertigen Schweizer Zutaten.
Ein Pie hat einen Durchmesser von etwa 24 cm und reicht f√ºr 6‚Äì10 St√ºcke ‚Äì je nachdem, wie gro√üz√ºgig du schneidest.
Du kannst deine Bestellung in Wallisellen abholen oder eine Lieferung im Raum Z√ºrich vereinbaren.
Da jeder Pie und jedes Dessert komplett von Grund auf zubereitet wird ‚Äì vom Teig bis zur F√ºllung ‚Äì bitte ich dich, mindestens 3 Tage im Voraus zu bestellen.
